markdownRemark.html:
I tried using the BeleniX liveCD today and I was actually pretty impressed. One question though: when it starts up, there is text that says copyright Sun Microsystems, usage subject to license terms. It doesn't say what those terms are, though. GPL v2, I presume?

I liked that the liveCD gives you the choice of using XFCE, KDE, or Compiz - surprising. Totally cool.
